content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/jacocoxmlparser is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the project structure to understand what we're working with.

My approach will be:
1. First, explore the repository structure
2. Check the pom.xml or build files to understand the current configuration
3. Update the Java version in build files
4. Run `mvn clean verify` to see if there are any compilation or test issues
5. Fix any issues that arise
6. Ensure `mvn clean verify` passes with JDK 17

Let me start by viewing the directory structure.

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>uk.co.alt236</groupId>
    <artifactId>jacocoxmlparser</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>1.8</source>
                    <target>1.8</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>0.8.3</version>

                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>generate-code-coverage-report</id>
                        <phase>test</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>report</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <!-- Build an executable JAR -->
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.1.0</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>shade</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>

                <configuration>
                    <dependencyReducedPomLocation>${project.build.directory}/dependency-reduced-pom.xml
                    </dependencyReducedPomLocation>

                    <transformers>
                        <transformer
                                implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
                            <manifestEntries>
                                <Main-Class>uk.co.alt236.jacocoxmlparser.Main</Main-Class>
                            </manifestEntries>
                        </transformer>
                    </transformers>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.0.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <archive>
                        <manifest>
                            <addDefaultImplementationEntries>true</addDefaultImplementationEntries>
                            <addDefaultSpecificationEntries>true</addDefaultSpecificationEntries>
                        </manifest>
                    </archive>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>

        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0-M3</version>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>commons-cli</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-cli</artifactId>
            <version>1.4</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>4.12</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-all</artifactId>
            <version>2.0.2-beta</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.findbugs</groupId>
            <artifactId>jsr305</artifactId>
            <version>3.0.2</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.sun.xml.bind</groupId>
            <artifactId>jaxb-impl</artifactId>
            <version>2.3.2</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.glassfish.jaxb</groupId>
            <artifactId>jaxb-core</artifactId>
            <version>2.3.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.sun.activation</groupId>
            <artifactId>javax.activation</artifactId>
            <version>1.2.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
            <version>3.8.1</version>
        </dependency>

    </dependencies>
</project>

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>uk.co.alt236</groupId>
    <artifactId>jacocoxmlparser</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>17</source>
                    <target>17</target>
                    <release>17</release>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>0.8.11</version>

                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>generate-code-coverage-report</id>
                        <phase>test</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>report</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <!-- Build an executable JAR -->
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.5.1</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>shade</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>

                <configuration>
                    <dependencyReducedPomLocation>${project.build.directory}/dependency-reduced-pom.xml
                    </dependencyReducedPomLocation>

                    <transformers>
                        <transformer
                                implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
                            <manifestEntries>
                                <Main-Class>uk.co.alt236.jacocoxmlparser.Main</Main-Class>
                            </manifestEntries>
                        </transformer>
                    </transformers>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.3.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <archive>
                        <manifest>
                            <addDefaultImplementationEntries>true</addDefaultImplementationEntries>
                            <addDefaultSpecificationEntries>true</addDefaultSpecificationEntries>
                        </manifest>
                    </archive>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>

        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.2.2</version>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

Excellent! The Java project has been successfully migrated from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Here's what was done:

## Migration Summary

### 1. **pom.xml Updates**
   - Updated `maven-compiler-plugin` from 3.2 to 3.11.0 with Java 17 configuration (`source`, `target`, and `release` set to 17)
   - Updated `jacoco-maven-plugin` from 0.8.3 to 0.8.11
   - Updated `maven-shade-plugin` from 3.1.0 to 3.5.1
   - Updated `maven-jar-plugin` from 3.0.2 to 3.3.0
   - Updated `maven-surefire-plugin` from 3.0.0-M3 to 3.2.2

### 2. **Dependencies Updates**
   - Updated JUnit from 4.12 to 4.13.2
   - Replaced `mockito-all` 2.0.2-beta with `mockito-core` 5.8.0 (compatible with Java 17)
   - Replaced old JAXB 2.x dependencies with Jakarta XML Binding 4.x:
     - Added `jakarta.xml.bind-api` 4.0.1
     - Updated `jaxb-impl` to 4.0.4
     - Removed `jaxb-core` and `javax.activation` (handled transitively)
   - Updated `commons-lang3` from 3.8.1 to 3.14.0

### 3. **Source Code Updates**
   Updated all JAXB imports from `javax.xml.bind` to `jakarta.xml.bind` in the following files:
   - Report.java
   - Package.java
   - Counter.java
   - Method.java
   - Clazz.java
   - ReportParser.java

### 4. **Verification**
   - `mvn clean verify` completes successfully with all 9 tests passing
   - Compiled bytecode version is 61 (Java 17)
   - All tests pass without errors

The migration is complete and the project now successfully builds and runs with JDK 17.
